title: Ticket #7716: Suggest ERESTART (85) for self-checkpoint code.
description:
Michael Pelletier suggests that HTCondor establish a convention regarding the exit code for successful checkpoints before we advertise support for the feature in the stable series. He suggests 85, which is ERESTART on Linux.

At present the interface requires you to specify the checkpoint exit code in order to get the behavior at all; if we change that in the future, the default exit code should be 85.
